trans-unit.source: Handles the XML elements used to configure XML serialization by the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer" />.
trans-unit.target: 處理 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer" /> 用來設定 XML 序列化的 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: This class is used to handle the [<parameter>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/parameter.md), specifically, to specify the generic parameter to use when adding a known type to a declared type.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別用來處理[<參數>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/parameter.md)，具體來說，若要指定宣告的類型加入已知型別時使用的泛型參數。

trans-unit.source: For an example of using configuration to add a type, see [<declaredTypes>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/declaredtypes.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用組態來新增類型的範例，請參閱[ <declaredTypes>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/declaredtypes.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.ParameterElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.ParameterElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.ParameterElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.ParameterElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a position in the collection of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 指定參數集合中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.ParameterElement" /> class with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的索引，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.ParameterElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter's type.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.ParameterElement" /> class with the specified type name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的型別名稱，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Configuration.ParameterElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the generic known type.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定泛型已知型別的位置。

trans-unit.source: The position of the parameter in the containing generic declared type.
trans-unit.target: 包含於泛型已宣告型別中之參數的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type name of the parameter of the generic known type.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定泛型已知型別之參數的型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The type name of the parameter.
